text: Hepialiscus is a genus of moths of the family Hepialidae. There are four described species found in Taiwan and Nepal. The larvae feed on grasses. ==Species== *Hepialiscus monticola - Taiwan *Hepialiscus nepalensis - Nepal *Hepialiscus robinsoni - Taiwan *Hepialiscus taiwanus - Taiwan ==External links== *Hepialidae genera Category:Hepialidae Category:Exoporia genera Category:Taxa named by George Hampson
title: Hepialiscus
